ICESEA.IC.summary: Iceland Seafood International hf., together with its subsidiaries, processes, sells, and distributes seafood products primarily in Iceland and internationally. The company operates through Value Added Southern Europe, Value Added Northern Europe, and Sales and Distribution segments. It provides ready meals, fresh seafood, coated products, landfrozen, shell fish, smoked fish, light and wet salted, frozen at sea, pelagic fish, dried products, and cephalopods. The company offers its products under the Islandia, Batter Me Up, Banord, Iceland Gold, Havelok, Islandia Armengol, Las Tapas de Islandia Armengol, OceanPath, Dunn's, Icelandic Seafood, and Seastar brands. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1932 and is headquartered in Reykjavik, Iceland.
